title: In 1995, a Netscape employee wrote a hack in 10 days that now runs the Internet
description: Thirty years later, JavaScript is the glue that holds the interactive web together, warts and all.
content: Thirty years later, JavaScript is the glue that holds the interactive web together, warts and all.
